Wednesday, February 23, 2005

Extracting UML diagrams from Rails source

Posted by admin

Schubert has been working on a program that’ll extract a UML diagram from your Rails application. On his weblog, Schubert has an example of how it looks right now with an extraction from Lutke’s Typo weblog engine:

He promises a release this weekend!
